Verses: 1 pileyaam Paalaagai Nokki: Neer Inge Enakku Ezhu Palipeedangalaik Katti, Ezhu Kaalaigalaiyum Ezhu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum Inge Enakku Aayaththappaduththum Endraan.
2 pileyaam Sonnapadiye Paalaak Seydhaan; Paalaagum Pileyaamum Ovvoru Peedaththil Ovvoru Kaalaiyaiyum Ovvoru Aattukkadaavaiyum Paliyittaargal.

3 pinbu Pileyaam Paalaagai Nokki: Ummudaiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyandaiyil Nillum, Naan Poivarugiren; Karththar Vandhu Ennai Sandhikkiradhaayirukkum; Avar Enakku Velippaduththuvadhai Umakku Arivippen Endru Solli, Oru Mettinmel Erinaan.
4 dhevan Pileyaamai Sandhiththaar; Appozhudhu Avan Avarai Nokki: Naan Ezhu Palipeedangalai Aayaththam Panni, Ovvoru Palipeedaththil Ovvoru Kaalaiyaiyum Ovvoru Aattukkadaavaiyum Paliyitten Endraan.
5 karththar Pileyaamin Vaayile Vaakku Aruli: Nee Paalaakinidaththil Thirumbippoi, Ivvidhamaai Sollakkadavaai Endraar.
6 avanidaththukku Avan Thirumbiponaan; Paalaak Movaapudaiya Sagala Prabukkalodunkoodath Than Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyandaiyile Nindrukondirundhaan.

7 appozhudhu Avan Than Vaakkiyaththai Eduththuraiththu: Movaapin Raajaavaagiya Paalaak Ennaik Kizhakku Malaigalilulla Aaraamilirundhu Varavazhaiththu: Nee Vandhu Enakkaaga Yaakkobai Sabikkavendum; Nee Vandhu Isravelai Veruththu Vidavendum Endru Sonnaan.
8 dhevan Sabikkaadhavanai Naan Sabippadheppadi? Karththar Verukkaadhavanai Naan Veruppadheppadi?
9 kanmalaiyuchchiyilirundhu Naan Avanaik Kandu, Kundrugalilirundhu Avanaip Paarkkiren; Andha Janangal Jaadhigalode Kalavaamal Thaniye Vaasamaayiruppaargal.
10 yaakkobin Thoolai Ennaththakkavan Yaar? Isravelin Kaarpangai Ennugiravan Yaar? Needhimaan Marippadhu Pol Naan Marippenaaga, En Mudivu Avan Mudivupol Iruppadhaaga Endraan.
11 appozhudhu Paalaak Pileyaamai Nokki: Neer Enakku Ennaseydheer; En Saththurukkalai Sabikkumpadi Ummai Azhaippiththen; Neer Avargalai Aaseervadhikkave Aaseervadhiththeer Endraan.
12 adharku Avan: Karththar En Vaayil Arulinadhaiye Solvadhu En Kadamaiyallavaa Endraan.

13 pinbu Paalaak Avanai Nokki: Neer Avargalaip Paarkkaththakka Veroru Idaththirku Ennodekooda Vaarum; Ange Avargal Ellaaraiyum Paaraamal, Avargaludaiya Kadaisip Paalayaththaimaaththiram Paarppeer; Angeyirundhu Enakkaaga Avargalai Sabikkavendum Endru Solli,
14 avanaip Piskaavin Kodumudiyil Irukkira Soppeemeen Veliyile Azhaiththukkondupoi, Ezhu Pali Peedangalaik Katti, Ovvoru Peedaththil Ovvoru Kaalaiyaiyum Ovvoru Aattukkadaavaiyum Paliyittaan.
15 appozhudhu Pileyaam Paalaagai Nokki: Inge Ummudaiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyandaiyil Nillum; Naan Ange Poik Karththarai Sandhiththuvarugiren Endraan.
16 karththar Pileyaamai Sandhiththu, Avan Vaayile Vasanaththai Aruli: Nee Paalaakinidaththirkuth Thirumbipoi, Ivvidhamaai Sollakkadavaai Endraar.
17 avanidaththirku Avan Varugirapodhu, Avan Movaapin Prabukkalodunkoodath Thannudaiya Sarvaangathaganapaliyandaiyile Nindrukondirundhaan; Paalaak Avanai Nokki: Karththar Enna Sonnaar Endru Kettaan.
18 appozhudhu Avan Than Vaakkiyaththai Eduththuraiththu: Paalaake, Ezhundhirundhu Kelum; Sipporin Kumaarane, Enakku Sevikodum.
19 poi Solla Dhevan Oru Manidhan Alla; Manammaara Avar Oru Manupuththiranum Alla; Avar Solliyum Seyyaadhiruppaaraa? Avar Vasaniththum Niraivetraadhiruppaaraa?
20 idho, Aaseervadhikkak Kattalaipetren; Avar Aaseervadhikkiraar, Adhai Naan Thiruppak Koodaadhu.

21 avar Yaakkobile Akkiramaththaik Kaangiradhum Illai, Isravelile Kutram Paarkkiradhum Illai; Avargaludaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avargalode Irukkiraar; Raajaavin Jayagembeeram Avargalukkulle Irukkiradhu.
22 dhevan Avargalai Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanninaar; Kaandaamirugaththukkoththa Belan Avargalukku Undu.
23 yaakkobukku Virodhamaana Mandhiravaadham Illai, Isravelukku Virodhamaana Kurisolludhalum Illai; Dhevan Ennenna Seydhaar Endru Konjak Kaalaththile Yaakkobaiyum Isravelaiyum Kuriththu Sollappadum.
24 andha Janam Dhushta Singampola Ezhumbum, Baala Singampola Nimirndhu Nirkum; Adhu Thaan Pidiththa Iraiyaip Patchiththu, Vettundavargalin Raththaththaik Kudikkumattum Paduththukkolvadhillai Endraan.
25 appozhudhu Paalaak Pileyaamai Nokki: Neer Avargalai Sabikkavum Vendaam, Avargalai Aaseervadhikkavum Vendaam Endraan.
26 adharkup Pileyaam Paalaagaip Paarththu: Karththar Sollugirapadiyellaam Seyven Endru Ummode Naan Sollavillaiyaa Endraan.
27 appozhudhu Paalaak Pileyaamai Nokki: Vaarum Veroru Idaththirku Ummai Azhaiththukkondu Pogiren; Neer Angeyirundhaavadhu Enakkaaga Avargalai Sabikkiradhu Dhevanukkup Piriyamaayirukkum Endru Solli,
28 avanai Eshimonukku Edhiraayirukkira Peyorin Kodumudikku Azhaiththukkondu Ponaan.
29 appozhudhu Pileyaam Paalaagai Nokki: Inge Enakku Ezhu Palipeedangalaik Katti, Inge Enakku Ezhu Kaalaigalaiyum Ezhu Aattuk Kadaakkalaiyum Aayaththampannum Endraan.
30 pileyaam Sonnapadi Paalaak Seydhu, Ovvoru Peedaththil Ovvoru Kaalaiyaiyum Ovvoru Aattukkadaavaiyum Paliyittaan.
